displayName.text: Upper West Side Medical: Dr Cynthia Myers MD & Dr Walt SargeantMD

formattedAddress: 464 W 145th St, New York, NY 10031, USA
adrFormatAddress: 464 W 145th St, New York, NY 10031-4701, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Walt Sargeant has been my doctor for years more than 10 years at least. Every time I have had a concern he's been very attentive to and will always direct me in the right direction. He is very direct and does not sure code things. He's also compassionate, never have I ever felt belittled or uncomfortable at his office. I only had a problem once at his office and it was with one of the staff members, she was a new young girl so I don't blame her too much for not understanding or knowing what she could have helped me with. Other than that I've never had an encounter and some of my family members also have him as a doctor. I definitely recommend him he is an understanding and very helpful doctor.

originalText.text:
The staff is courteous and polite. Dr Sargeant is great at capturing
while explaining away patients' inquiries as well a engaging in small talk.
I didn't think one could be more friendly- it shows how much emphasis is placed on the customer service and care via their web portal. It is always with immense satisfaction that I leave that office. Keep up the great work!

originalText.text: I have been going to Dr Sargent for several years.  He took excellent care of my father until his death.  I have referred my daughter as well.  He is a no nonsense Doctor and tells you as it is.  He believes in your overall well being and takes personal interest in your care.  He is great African American doctor with a sense of humor and takes pride in his work.

originalText.text: Dr. Sargeant is the worst doctor I've ever come in contact with. Doesn't have any compassion or sympathy for patients. Glad to take the time to post this. Avoid if you can.

originalText.text: Dr. Myers is very thorough and is great to my client's needs and concerns. He has had top medical services for 20 plus years. He is very grateful to Dr. Myers.
